title: Eden
content:
This isn't exactly my first bitmap font, but it's the first I'm creating as a complete font for public distribution. I'm more of a pixel-pusher than a graphic designer, so I'd appreciate any feedback you could give on this. It's intended as a small screen font for use on high-resolution displays.   
 ![Eden Regular Preview](http://web.archive.org/web/20150414150521im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/29/8817.gif)
author: grayhaze

comments.content: its a very nice font in my opinion. the # is somehow wierd and will hardly be recognized. the shapes are very crisp and nice, and the whole font is quite clear for its size.
